Amazon Labor Union - Wikipedia
s: March 22, 2025 - The Amazon Labor Union (ALU) is a labor union specifically for Amazon workers, created on April 20, 2021. On April 1, 2022, the Amazon workers at a warehouse in Staten Island, JFK8, backed by the ALU became the first unionized Amazon workers recognized by the National Labor Relations Board.

t: Amazon Labor Union-IBT Local 1
s: On April 1st, 2022, Amazon workers at the JFK8 Fulfilment Center on Staten Island made history by voting to form the first Amazon Union in U.S. history. Our demands are simple: better pay, better benefits, and better working conditions. Amazon workers know the only way we’re going to pressure ...

t: We’re fighting to become the first Amazon union in the South. Here’s our story. - Inequality.org
s: February 10, 2025 - An organizer of the independent campaign to unionize an Amazon warehouse in North Carolina shares his experience fighting against the e-commerce giant.

t: Amazon Workers on Staten Island Vote to Unionize in Landmark Win for Labor (Published 2022)
s: Employees cast 2,654 votes to be represented by Amazon Labor Union and 2,131 against, giving the union a win by more than 10 percentage points, according to the National Labor Relations Board.

t: Amazon Brand Registry | Sell on Amazon
s: Enroll your brand in Amazon Brand Registry to unlock tools designed to protect and build your brand, creating a better experience for your Amazon customers.

t: Amazon Is Cracking Down on Union Organizing, Workers Say - The New York Times
s: December 8, 2023 - The company has disciplined union supporters and fired one in recent weeks, ahead of a trial that will weigh their right to interact with co-workers.

t: Amazon and trade unions - Wikipedia
s: 1 week ago - While unions are common among Amazon warehouse workers in Europe, few of Amazon's American workers are unionized. Amazon has actively opposed unionization in the United States, having stated a preference to resolve issues with employees directly, asserting that unions would impede the company's ...

t: How Amazon Crushes Unions - The New York Times
s: October 21, 2021 - The notice was printed simply, in just two colors, and crammed with words. But for any worker who bothered to look closely, it was a remarkable declaration. Amazon listed 22 forms of behavior it said it would disavow, each beginning in capital letters: “WE WILL NOT.”

t: The Campaign to Unionize Amazon Gains Momentum - Inequality.org
s: October 4, 2024 - The union shook things up this summer by electing a reform caucus into leadership and voting overwhelmingly to affiliate with the Teamsters, bringing much needed financial and organizational resources to efforts to not just be the first union at Amazon but the first with a collective bargaining ...

t: Telling the Amazon Labor Union’s Story | The Nation
s: October 17, 2024 - The film follows the organizing drive between the summer of 2021 and the union election in March 2022, from early meetings between coworkers to the collection of signed union cards to a victorious vote and the creation of the first (and still only) officially recognized labor union for Amazon ...

t: How Amazon Is Taking Its Union-Busting to New Heights | The Nation
s: February 13, 2025 - Organizers describe fear tactics, amped-up security, and daily town halls as workers vote on whether to unionize.

t: Amazon Labor Union members vote overwhelmingly in favor of an affiliation with the Teamsters | AP News
s: June 18, 2024 - New York City warehouse workers who are part of the Amazon Labor Union have overwhelmingly voted to align themselves with the Teamsters as they try to get a contract from the online retailer.

t: Union Sales @ Amazon.com:
s: Online shopping from a great selection at Union Sales Store.

t: ‘They are breaking the law’: inside Amazon’s bid to stall a union drive | Amazon | The Guardian
s: April 3, 2024 - Retailer doing ‘whatever it takes’ to halt organizing at warehouse in Moreno Valley, California, workers say, as Amazon faces unfair labor practice charges

t: UNI Amazon Global Union Alliance Archives
s: UNI Global Union Amazon Alliance fights for collective bargaining and the affirmation of the dignity of work at Amazon.

t: Amazon Division - International Brotherhood of Teamsters
s: March 4, 2025 - Amazon workers across the country are coming together to fight for the safe jobs and fair pay that we deserve. Want to organize an Amazon union? Want to learn about Amazon workers' rights? Fill out the form below to get in touch with a Teamsters organizer.

t: Labor's labors lost? A year after stunning victory at Amazon, unions are stalled
s: March 31, 2023 - Labor organizing surged last year, led by Amazon and Starbucks. A Gallup poll found 71% of Americans approve of unions. Yet only 10% of workers belong to a union, as employers continue to fight back.

t: Amazon.com – Wikipedia, wolna encyklopedia
s: August 12, 2006 - Amazon.com, Inc. (wym. [ˈæməzɒn]) – amerykańskie przedsiębiorstwo handlowe, spółka akcyjna założona w 1994 w Seattle. Zajmuje się handlem elektronicznym (e-handlem) B2C i prowadzi największy na świecie sklep internetowy. Amazon został założony przez Jeffa Bezosa w 1994 r., ...
